about_the_game:
Playground Rumble is an action-packed roguelike where every toy you find transforms your gameplay in unique ways. Join Miguel and Manuela on an exciting journey to recover their stolen toys, battling hordes of out-of-control playthings.

Explore Familiar Worlds:

  • The House: Defend Miguel and Manuela’s home, taking on rebellious toys in an environment full of surprises.

  • Future Adventures: Get ready to explore new maps, such as a neighborhood playground, a school, and even a circus filled with mysteries and challenges.

Key Features:

  • Procedural Maps: Each playthrough is unique, with layouts changing every time you replay, ensuring no two runs are the same.

  • Intense Action: Face escalating challenges in stages packed with dangers and surprises.

  • Weapons and Strategies: Choose from 3 distinct weapons, each with unique abilities and playstyles to customize your approach.

  • Powerful Items: Discover over 10 items that unlock special abilities and let you create unique strategic combinations.
